slides.title: Sustainable Mining Practices
slides.description: Promoting environmentally responsible and sustainable mining practices across artisanal and small-scale mining operations worldwide.

slides.title: Gender Equality in Mining
slides.description: Empowering women in artisanal and small-scale mining through education, training, and equitable policy development.

slides.title: Formalization Programs
slides.description: Supporting the formalization of artisanal and small-scale mining to improve working conditions and economic outcomes.

slides.title: Market Access Initiatives
slides.description: Creating better market access and fair pricing for minerals extracted through artisanal and small-scale mining.

page4.title: News and Events

page5.title: Collaborating for Improved Transparency
page5.description:
The World Bank envisions a world in which artisanal and small-scale mining is recognized as an important contributor to global development.

In order to achieve this goal, we must work together to promote better sharing of knowledge and data.

Join us in commitment to improve the quality, availability and accessibility of data in the ASM sector.
